poster: B X N E S C A
title: how quickly does riot respond to credit fraud??
body: I've been locked out of my account (I cant even post from it, this is an alternate new account) saying its "transferring" and I submitted a ticket yesterday for it, its understandable that it will take a minute for a response but this was before I logged into my bank account today. Its clear that my account has been hacked - whoever did it has spent $200 off of my debit card on RP. I've submitted a ticket just a little bit ago, but I'm hoping I don't have to sit and wait 2 days for a response. I don't carry cash, this is the only card I have and i'd prefer not to have to freeze it.

replies.body:
I can't give you an expected wait time, since response times will depend on how many tickets were submitted recently and where your ticket is in that queue. Our ticket specialists answer tickets on a first-come-first-served basis, so you'll have to wait for your ticket to reach a specialist.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
